tool_description: Get the 30 Euro foreign exchange reference rates in JSON-format. Updated every day at around 16:00 CET by the ECB (European Central Bank).
title: European Central Bank - Reference Rates

api_list.name: GetReferenceRates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://european-central-bank-reference-rates.p.rapidapi.com/GetReferenceRates"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "european-central-bank-reference-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
